Project Description:
Abandon one well water source & treatment facility, construct approx. 7-mile water transmission main to connect
to neighboring Aledo water supply.
Construction of water treatment filtration system with filter backwash disposal at Well #4 to remove manganese

Constuction of new water treatment plant, demolition of existing water treatment plant and construction of force
main and lift station for backwash disposal.
Construct treatment plant, storage tank and watermain

Construct water transmission main to connect to City of
Peru water system.

Implementation of a manganese treatment process at the
water treatment plant.

Construct 7,700 feet of water main to loop dead end and
abandon existing water treatment facilities.
